revised_title: Susceptibility of Animals to the Trypanosome Causing Disease in Man in Nyasaland
tldr: The study investigates the susceptibility of various animals to the trypanosome causing disease in man in Nyasaland. The researchers found that different strains of the trypanosome had similar pathogenic actions on animals, suggesting that they all belong to the same species, Trypanosoma brucei vel rhodesiense.
